alert.note: Alert for Mobile; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 8:59PM CDT until May 14 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... South central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 859 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of McIntosh, or 10 miles northeast of Citronelle, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Citronelle, Gulfcrest, Mount Vernon and Movico. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
